thread.title_full: Kohl’s.com: Jane Accent Chair Only $59.49 (Regularly $199.99) + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s.com: Jane Accent Chair Only $59.49 (Regularly $199.99) + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash
text:
How cute are these chairs!? Now through March 12th, Kohl’s.com is offering $10 off a $25 purchase when you use promo code LUCKY at checkout. In addition, if you haven’t already, sign up for Kohl’s text alerts by texting SAVE24 to 56457 for a unique code good for 15% off your purchase. In addition, you can save 20% off your furniture or home decor purchase with promo code REFRESH20 at checkout, through March 12th.

Kohl’s Deal Idea: Buy 1 Jane Accent Chair $99.99 (reg. $199.99) 
Use promo code REFRESH20 to get 20% off a purchase of furniture & home decor
Use promo code LUCKY to get $10 off a $25 purchase
Use unique 15% off purchase code (by texting SAVE24 to 56457 )
Choose Free in-store pickup or free shipping on purchases of $75 or more
Final cost $59.49 plus get $10 Kohl’s Cash!

Through March 12th, everyone gets $10 Kohl’s Cash for every $50 spent in store, online , at a Kohl’s Kiosk or with the Kohl’s App on all sale-, regular- and clearance-priced merchandise! In addition, any Kohl’s Cash earned from March 3rd – March 12th is redeemable in store, online , at a Kohl’s Kiosk and on the Kohl’s App March 13th – March 26th.
